original_title: Dialogue: Wole Soyinka et L. S. Senghor
overview: Based on archive material, Manthia Diawara organizes an imagined dialogue between Léopold Senghor, one of the founders of the concept of Negritude, and Wole Soyinka, a Nigerian writer awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature.
title: Négritude. A Dialogue between Wole Soyinka and Léopold Senghor
